name: Krampus is Home
storyline:
Krampus is Home is a terrifying first-person survival horror experience that brings the chilling legend of Krampus to life. Inspired by Central European folklore, the game follows Sebastian, a rebellious teenager spending Christmas Eve alone. What starts as an ordinary night quickly turns into a nightmare when eerie noises echo through his home, and shadowy figures emerge from the darkness.

As the holiday spirit twists into terror, Sebastian finds himself hunted by Krampus and his sinister minions, grotesque creatures that lurk in the shadows, watching his every move. Trapped in his own house, he must rely on his wits, stealth, and whatever he can find to survive. But escape is only the beginning.

Dragged into Krampus’s nightmarish domain, Sebastian must navigate through twisted landscapes and horrifying trials, uncovering the grim truth behind his abduction. As he pieces together the dark secrets buried in his past, he realizes this isn’t just a punishment, it’s a test.
summary: Krampus is Home is a chilling first-person survival horror experience inspired by Central European folklore. You’ll step into the shoes of Sebastian, a teenager left home alone on Christmas Eve, only to be hunted by Krampus and his sinister helpers. With intense stealth mechanics, survival strategies, and action-packed gameplay, you’ll need to evade Krampus’s grasp and fight for your survival. Uncover the dark mystery behind your abduction and find a way to escape from Krampus’s realm.
